attributes.action: Respect our animals, Introduce silent fireworks.
attributes.additional_details:
Throughout extensive research, evidence the percentage is increasingly high on how badly the loud fireworks are affecting our animals, scaring them into corners, purely for what enjoyment may I ask. 
I recently viewed a firework display my only thoughts were worrying about my dog home scared, shaking not knowing what to do with herself, is this fair for our loved pets to be subjected to this?
attributes.background: I believe out of respect not only for our animals, but also noise pollution, the ridiculous noises going into the late of the night affecting children's sleeping, noise fire works should be Ban, and only the use of silent fireworks should be allowed.
